StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're headed to the <clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff> up
ahead, you'll have to move carefully.<sp:0:4:0>A<clr:0000> large number of monsters have taken
control<clr:ffff> of the bridge.<sp:0:4:0>While I'd like to drive them out myself,
there's little I can do on my own.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>This would be a perfect job for the
<clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>, but...<sp:0:4:0>I hear they're hard at work at the foot of
<clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff> in Eldin right now.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It used to be that this path would lead
to Death Mountain...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though with the increase in monsters, it's
fallen all to ruin.<sp:0:4:0>Those <clr:0000>grasping<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>reddish-black monsters<clr:ffff>
that creep along the ground are especially
troublesome. Unsettling too.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You seem to know your way around a
sword well enough, but be careful not
to approach them carelessly.
BackRange_01_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sounds like all those monsters that took
over the Akkala Span up ahead have been
wiped out.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I wouldn't have been able to take them
alone... Pretty impressive that this is the
<clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>'s job!
SavedLv2_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Sarqso!<sp:5:0:0> What a skilled fighter you are.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I was in real danger back there...<sp:5:1:0> I owe
you my life!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The path to Death Mountain before us
has fallen to ruin with the resurgence
of monsters.
Those <clr:0000>grasping<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>reddish-black monsters<clr:ffff>
that lunge at passersby might be the
worst the path has to offer.
Some friendly adviceâ€”<sp:5:1:0>if you must get
close, do so with caution.
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I was hoping to follow this road to
Goron City...<sp:0:4:0>But I probably shouldn't risk it.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Tsk... <sp:5:0:0>Taken by surprise like this...
I should have stayed on guard.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The path up to Death Mountain has been
a mess ever since the recent surge
of monsters.
The <clr:0000>freaky<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>grasping<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>reddish-black ones<clr:ffff>
are particularly nasty.<sp:0:4:0>They say that if one so much as touches
you, it'll steal your life away.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ugh. All I want to do is hunt for my voe
in peace. What's this world coming to?
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks for the assist!<sp:5:0:0> I was having a bit
of trouble on my own.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>A <clr:0000>large number of monsters are
occupying<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff> up ahead and
making it dangerous to cross.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wish the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff> were
here, but they're busy with something at
the foot of <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff> in Eldin.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM>We need to run away, quickly!<sp:5:0:0> There's no
defeating that monster!
StartPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take care if you're headed to the
<clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff> up ahead. A <clr:0000>large number
of monsters are occupying it<clr:ffff> right now.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I thought about trying to clear them out
myself, but figured I'd hardly put a dent
in them on my own.
Luckily, the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff> is
headed their way. Those monsters might
already be dealt with.
It's nice to have a team we can rely on.
StartPoint_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff> up ahead has been <clr:0000>taken
over by a bunch of monsters<clr:ffff>, which has
put me in a bit of a bind.
But the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff> has set out
to take them down. The bridge might
already be monster-free!
That monster-control crew really is
something else.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>I can't believe I let myself get taken down
so easily...
StartPoint_01_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A large number of <clr:0000>monsters had taken
over the<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff> up ahead...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>But just when I was about to take matters
into my own hands, I discovered that they
had already been wiped out!<sp:5:1:0>
I wonder if that was the <clr:0000>monster-control
crew<clr:ffff>'s handiwork. They really are a
reliable bunch.
RainRun_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Down it comes...<sp:5:1:0> Getting rained on can
be refreshing. Getting rained on without
warning, less so.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>*pant*<sp:5:1:0> *pant*<sp:5:1:0> I can't believe my blade
failed to strike true... But you saved me!
Failed01: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Sad>Oww...<sp:5:0:0> To think I call myself a Gerudo...
Thanks00:
This is the least I can do to thank you.<sp:5:0:0>
Please, take it!
StartPoint_01_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>The monsters who took over the <clr:0000>Akkala
Span <clr:ffff>up ahead have all been wiped out!<sp:0:4:0>Now people are free to travel that route
in peace.<sp:0:4:0>If that was work of the <clr:0000>monster-control
crew<clr:ffff>, my appreciation for them only
continues to grow!
RainRun_02: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Do you mind if I get out of the rain first?
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I'm sorry...<sp:5:1:0> I should have been able to
handle a threat like that.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe all this
traveling is wearing me out.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Given your skill, I bet you're some famous
swordsman, huh? <sp:5:0:0>You really saved me!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Grasping<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>reddish-black monsters<clr:ffff> have
appeared on the path to Death Mountain
up ahead.
Those nightmarish beasts can steal away
your life with the slightest touch.<sp:0:4:0>Ugh...<sp:5:0:0> All we can do is pray that we
never cross paths with one.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>That shouldn't have been such a
challenge for me...<sp:5:1:0> I must train harder.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Footsteps are muffled on rainy days, so
it's <clr:0000>difficult for monsters to notice you
approach<clr:ffff>. It's pretty great!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The recent increase in monsters has made
a mess of the Death Mountain path ahead.<sp:0:4:0>And the worst monsters of all are those
<clr:0000>grasping<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>reddish-black ones<clr:ffff> that crawl
along the ground.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>One touch from them and you'll feel your
life draining away.<sp:0:4:0>I recommend you give them a wide berth.<sp:5:0:0>
Be careful out there.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rain.<sp:5:0:0> I grew up in the Gerudo region,
so it still feels so new to me.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>And I love it! The patter of the rain
covers your footsteps, so it's <clr:0000>harder
for monsters to hear you approach<clr:ffff>.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems a large number of monsters have
taken over the Akkala Span ahead of us.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I think I'll just defeat them all myself
before the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff> arrives.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems that a large number of monsters
have taken control of the Akkala Span
up ahead.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm on my way to investigate now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201>If it's something I can take care of by
myself, then I'll just wipe them out before
the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff> gets there.
BackRange_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems that a large number of monsters
have taken control of the Akkala Span
up ahead.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm on my way to investigate now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Although apparently the <clr:0000>monster-control
crew<clr:ffff> is already on their way, so there
might not be much for me to do.
AssassinClothes: That look is in bad taste.
BackRange_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems a large number of monsters have
taken over the Akkala Span ahead of us.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>But I hear the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff> is
already on their way!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey, you!<sp:5:0:0> Where do you think you're
headed?<sp:5:0:0> If you were planning to take
the road to Death Mountain, don't!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The increase in monsters has laid the
whole thing to waste.<sp:0:4:0>And you have to be extra careful around
the <clr:0000>grasping<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>reddish-black monsters<clr:ffff> that
crawl along the ground.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad>If you're attacked by one of those, you're
not making it back alive.
BackRange_01_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A large number of monsters had occupied
Akkala Span up ahead...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>But thankfully, they've already been
wiped out!<sp:0:4:0>I don't know for sure that it was the
<clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>, <sp:5:1:0>but it's nice that
I won't have to clear things out myself.
